alert.note: Alert for Polk; San Jacinto (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 11 at 4:34PM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central San Jacinto and southern Polk Counties through 515 PM CST... At 434 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lake Livingston State Park, or 9 miles west of Livingston, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Livingston, Coldspring, Point Blank, Goodrich, Lake Livingston State Park, Alabama-Coushatta Reservation, West Livingston and Segno. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
